merge_colour: With this function you can take two colours and then merge them together to make a new colour. The amount of each of the component colours can be defined by changing the "amount" argument, where a value of 0 will return the first colour (col1), a value of 1 will return the second colour (col2) and a value in between will return the corresponding mix.
